mathop_sse2.tc

00001 /*
00002  *  mathop_sse2.tc
00003  *  vlfeat
00004  *
00005  *  Created by Andrea Vedaldi on 12/07/2009.
00006  *  Copyright 2009 UCLA. All rights reserved.

00009 
00010 #include "float.th"
00011 
00012 #ifndef __SSE2__
00013 #error "mathop_sse2.tc requires the compiler to have SSE2 intrinsics enabled"
00014 #endif
00015 
00016 #include <emmintrin.h>
00017 
00018 VL_INLINE T
00019 VL_XCAT(_vl_vhsum_sse2_, SFX)(VTYPE x)
00020 {
00021   T acc ;
00022 #if (VSIZE == 4)
00023   {
00024     VTYPE sum ;
00025     VTYPE shuffle ;
00026     /* shuffle = [1 0 3 2] */
00027     /* sum     = [3+1 2+0 1+3 0+2] */
00028     /* shuffle = [2+0 3+1 0+2 1+3] */
00029     /* vacc    = [3+1+2+0 3+1+2+0 1+3+0+2 0+2+1+3] */
00030     shuffle = VSHU (x, x, _MM_SHUFFLE(1, 0, 3, 2)) ;
00031     sum     = VADD (x, shuffle) ;
00032     shuffle = VSHU (sum, sum, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 3, 0, 1)) ;
00033     x       = VADD (sum, shuffle) ;
00034   }
00035 #else
00036   {
00037     VTYPE shuffle ;
00038     /* acc     = [1   0  ] */
00039     /* shuffle = [0   1  ] */
00040     /* sum     = [1+0 0+1] */
00041     shuffle = VSHU (x, x, _MM_SHUFFLE2(0, 1)) ;
00042     x       = VADD (x, shuffle) ;
00043   }
00044 #endif
00045   VST1(&acc, x);
00046   return acc ;
00047 }
00048 
00049 VL_EXPORT T
00050 VL_XCAT(_vl_distance_l2_sse2_, SFX)
00051 (vl_size dimension, T const * X, T const * Y)
00052 {
00053   T const * X_end = X + dimension ;
00054   T const * X_vec_end = X_end - VSIZE + 1 ;
00055   T acc ;
00056   VTYPE vacc = VSTZ() ;
00057   vl_bool dataAligned = VALIGNED(X) & VALIGNED(Y) ;
00058 
00059   if (dataAligned) {
00060     while (X < X_vec_end) {
00061       VTYPE a = *(VTYPE*)X ;
00062       VTYPE b = *(VTYPE*)Y ;
00063       VTYPE delta = VSUB(a, b) ;
00064       VTYPE delta2 = VMUL(delta, delta) ;
00065       vacc = VADD(vacc, delta2) ;
00066       X += VSIZE ;
00067       Y += VSIZE ;
00068     }
00069   } else {
00070     while (X < X_vec_end) {
00071       VTYPE a = VLDU(X) ;
00072       VTYPE b = VLDU(Y) ;
00073       VTYPE delta = VSUB(a, b) ;
00074       VTYPE delta2 = VMUL(delta, delta) ;
00075       vacc = VADD(vacc, delta2) ;
00076       X += VSIZE ;
00077       Y += VSIZE ;
00078     }
00079   }
00080 
00081   acc = VL_XCAT(_vl_vhsum_sse2_, SFX)(vacc) ;
00082 
00083   while (X < X_end) {
00084     T a = *X++ ;
00085     T b = *Y++ ;
00086     T delta = a - b ;
00087     acc += delta * delta ;
00088   }
00089 
00090   return acc ;
00091 }
00092 
00093 VL_EXPORT T
00094 VL_XCAT(_vl_distance_l1_sse2_, SFX)
00095 (vl_size dimension, T const * X, T const * Y)
00096 {
00097   T const * X_end = X + dimension ;
00098   T const * X_vec_end = X + dimension - VSIZE ;
00099   T acc ;
00100   VTYPE vacc = VSTZ() ;
00101   VTYPE vminus = VL_XCAT(_mm_set1_p, VSFX) ((T) -0.0) ; /* sign bit */
00102   vl_bool dataAligned = VALIGNED(X) & VALIGNED(Y) ;
00103 
00104   if (dataAligned) {
00105     while (X < X_vec_end) {
00106       VTYPE a = *(VTYPE*)X ;
00107       VTYPE b = *(VTYPE*)Y ;
00108       VTYPE delta = VSUB(a, b) ;
00109       vacc = VADD(vacc, VANDN(vminus, delta)) ;
00110       X += VSIZE ;
00111       Y += VSIZE ;
00112     }
00113   } else {
00114     while (X < X_vec_end) {
00115       VTYPE a = VLDU(X) ;
00116       VTYPE b = VLDU(Y) ;
00117       VTYPE delta = VSUB(a, b) ;
00118       vacc = VADD(vacc, VANDN(vminus, delta)) ;
00119       X += VSIZE ;
00120       Y += VSIZE ;
00121     }
00122   }
00123 
00124   acc = VL_XCAT(_vl_vhsum_sse2_, SFX)(vacc) ;
00125 
00126   while (X < X_end) {
00127     T a = *X++ ;
00128     T b = *Y++ ;
00129     T delta = a - b ;
00130     acc += VL_MAX(delta, - delta) ;
00131   }
00132 
00133   return acc ;
00134 }
00135 
00136 VL_EXPORT T
00137 VL_XCAT(_vl_distance_chi2_sse2_, SFX)
00138 (vl_size dimension, T const * X, T const * Y)
00139 {
00140   T const * X_end = X + dimension ;
00141   T const * X_vec_end = X + dimension - VSIZE ;
00142   T acc ;
00143   VTYPE vacc = VSTZ() ;
00144   vl_bool dataAligned = VALIGNED(X) & VALIGNED(Y) ;
00145 
00146   if (dataAligned) {
00147     while (X < X_vec_end) {
00148       VTYPE a = *(VTYPE*)X ;
00149       VTYPE b = *(VTYPE*)Y ;
00150       VTYPE delta = VSUB(a, b) ;
00151       VTYPE denom = VADD(a, b) ;
00152       VTYPE numer = VMUL(delta, delta) ;
00153       VTYPE ratio = VDIV(numer, denom) ;
00154       ratio = VAND(ratio, VNEQ(denom, VSTZ())) ;
00155       vacc = VADD(vacc, ratio) ;
00156       X += VSIZE ;
00157       Y += VSIZE ;
00158     }
00159   } else {
00160     while (X < X_vec_end) {
00161       VTYPE a = VLDU(X) ;
00162       VTYPE b = VLDU(Y) ;
00163       VTYPE delta = VSUB(a, b) ;
00164       VTYPE denom = VADD(a, b) ;
00165       VTYPE numer = VMUL(delta, delta) ;
00166       VTYPE ratio = VDIV(numer, denom) ;
00167       ratio = VAND(ratio, VNEQ(denom, VSTZ())) ;
00168       vacc = VADD(vacc, ratio) ;
00169       X += VSIZE ;
00170       Y += VSIZE ;
00171     }
00172   }
00173 
00174   acc = VL_XCAT(_vl_vhsum_sse2_, SFX)(vacc) ;
00175 
00176   while (X < X_end) {
00177     T a = *X++ ;
00178     T b = *Y++ ;
00179     T delta = a - b ;
00180     T denom = a + b ;
00181     T numer = delta * delta ;
00182     if (denom) {
00183       T ratio = numer / denom ;
00184       acc += ratio ;
00185     }
00186   }
00187   return acc ;
00188 }
00189 
00190 
00191 VL_EXPORT T
00192 VL_XCAT(_vl_kernel_l2_sse2_, SFX)
00193 (vl_size dimension, T const * X, T const * Y)
00194 {
00195   T const * X_end = X + dimension ;
00196   T const * X_vec_end = X_end - VSIZE + 1 ;
00197   T acc ;
00198   VTYPE vacc = VSTZ() ;
00199   vl_bool dataAligned = VALIGNED(X) & VALIGNED(Y) ;
00200 
00201   if (dataAligned) {
00202     while (X < X_vec_end) {
00203       VTYPE a = *(VTYPE*)X ;
00204       VTYPE b = *(VTYPE*)Y ;
00205       vacc = VADD(vacc, VMUL(a,b)) ;
00206       X += VSIZE ;
00207       Y += VSIZE ;
00208     }
00209   } else {
00210     while (X < X_vec_end) {
00211       VTYPE a = VLDU(X) ;
00212       VTYPE b = VLDU(Y) ;
00213       vacc = VADD(vacc, VMUL(a,b)) ;
00214       X += VSIZE ;
00215       Y += VSIZE ;
00216     }
00217   }
00218 
00219   acc = VL_XCAT(_vl_vhsum_sse2_, SFX)(vacc) ;
00220 
00221   while (X < X_end) {
00222     T a = *X++ ;
00223     T b = *Y++ ;
00224     acc += a * b ;
00225   }
00226 
00227   return acc ;
00228 }
00229 
00230 VL_EXPORT T
00231 VL_XCAT(_vl_kernel_l1_sse2_, SFX)
00232 (vl_size dimension, T const * X, T const * Y)
00233 {
00234   T const * X_end = X + dimension ;
00235   T const * X_vec_end = X_end - VSIZE + 1 ;
00236   T acc ;
00237   VTYPE vacc = VSTZ() ;
00238   VTYPE vminus = VL_XCAT(_mm_set1_p, VSFX) ((T) -0.0) ;
00239   vl_bool dataAligned = VALIGNED(X) & VALIGNED(Y) ;
00240 
00241   if (dataAligned) {
00242     while (X < X_vec_end) {
00243       VTYPE a = *(VTYPE*)X ;
00244       VTYPE b = *(VTYPE*)Y ;
00245       VTYPE a_ = VANDN(vminus, a) ;
00246       VTYPE b_ = VANDN(vminus, b) ;
00247       VTYPE sum = VADD(a_,b_) ;
00248       VTYPE diff = VSUB(a, b) ;
00249       VTYPE diff_ = VANDN(vminus, diff) ;
00250       vacc = VADD(vacc, VSUB(sum, diff_)) ;
00251       X += VSIZE ;
00252       Y += VSIZE ;
00253     }
00254   } else {
00255     while (X < X_vec_end) {
00256       VTYPE a = VLDU(X) ;
00257       VTYPE b = VLDU(Y) ;
00258       VTYPE a_ = VANDN(vminus, a) ;
00259       VTYPE b_ = VANDN(vminus, b) ;
00260       VTYPE sum = VADD(a_,b_) ;
00261       VTYPE diff = VSUB(a, b) ;
00262       VTYPE diff_ = VANDN(vminus, diff) ;
00263       vacc = VADD(vacc, VSUB(sum, diff_)) ;
00264       X += VSIZE ;
00265       Y += VSIZE ;
00266     }
00267   }
00268 
00269   acc = VL_XCAT(_vl_vhsum_sse2_, SFX)(vacc) ;
00270 
00271   while (X < X_end) {
00272     T a = *X++ ;
00273     T b = *Y++ ;
00274     T a_ = VL_XCAT(vl_abs_, SFX) (a) ;
00275     T b_ = VL_XCAT(vl_abs_, SFX) (b) ;
00276     acc += a_ + b_ - VL_XCAT(vl_abs_, SFX) (a - b) ;
00277   }
00278 
00279   return acc / ((T)2) ;
00280 }
00281 
00282 VL_EXPORT T
00283 VL_XCAT(_vl_kernel_chi2_sse2_, SFX)
00284 (vl_size dimension, T const * X, T const * Y)
00285 {
00286   T const * X_end = X + dimension ;
00287   T const * X_vec_end = X + dimension - VSIZE ;
00288   T acc ;
00289   VTYPE vacc = VSTZ() ;
00290   vl_bool dataAligned = VALIGNED(X) & VALIGNED(Y) ;
00291 
00292   if (dataAligned) {
00293     while (X < X_vec_end) {
00294       VTYPE a = *(VTYPE*)X ;
00295       VTYPE b = *(VTYPE*)Y ;
00296       VTYPE denom = VADD(a, b) ;
00297       VTYPE numer = VMUL(a,b) ;
00298       VTYPE ratio = VDIV(numer, denom) ;
00299       ratio = VAND(ratio, VNEQ(denom, VSTZ())) ;
00300       vacc = VADD(vacc, ratio) ;
00301       X += VSIZE ;
00302       Y += VSIZE ;
00303     }
00304   } else {
00305     while (X < X_vec_end) {
00306       VTYPE a = VLDU(X) ;
00307       VTYPE b = VLDU(Y) ;
00308       VTYPE denom = VADD(a, b) ;
00309       VTYPE numer = VMUL(a,b) ;
00310       VTYPE ratio = VDIV(numer, denom) ;
00311       ratio = VAND(ratio, VNEQ(denom, VSTZ())) ;
00312       vacc = VADD(vacc, ratio) ;
00313       X += VSIZE ;
00314       Y += VSIZE ;
00315     }
00316   }
00317 
00318   acc = VL_XCAT(_vl_vhsum_sse2_, SFX)(vacc) ;
00319 
00320   while (X < X_end) {
00321     T a = *X++ ;
00322     T b = *Y++ ;
00323     T denom = a + b ;
00324     if (denom) {
00325       T ratio = a * b / denom ;
00326       acc += ratio ;
00327     }
00328   }
00329   return ((T)2) * acc ;
00330 }
